name: This portfolio
description: A professional portfolio highlighting key skills and interests.

name: README Generator
description: A command-line application that uses Node.js to dynamically generate a professional README.md file from a user's input using the NPM Inquirer package.

name: Password Gemerator
description: A password generator that returns a password based on the user's selected options.

name: Weather Forecast App
description: A simple app rendering the weather forecast for the next 5 days for a city input provided by the user.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day by modifying the starter code.
